forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 46. Southwest wind 7 to 14 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 37. West wind around 8 mph.

weather_report:
In Boston this afternoon, the sky wears a muted palette as the sun pokes through wispy clouds, casting a gentle warmth over the city. A brisk southwest breeze stirs the crispness in the air, encouraging a midday stroll along the Charles River or a quiet pause at a quaint café. The temperature hovers comfortably near 46 degrees, a welcome respite for those who haven’t yet tucked away their outerwear. As daylight wanes, the clouds will thicken, turning the evening into a mostly cloudy tableau, with temperatures dipping to around 37. 

With these shifting conditions, layering becomes essential. A light sweater or a smart jacket will serve well against the evening chill, perhaps paired with a warm scarf to ward off the cool west wind that will accompany the transition into night. As dusk approaches, one might find joy in visiting a nearby bookshop, losing oneself in the pages of literature, or savoring the last moments of daylight from a cozy corner of a favorite pub. The choices are comforting and simple, perfect for embracing the seasonal change in this historic city.
